name: HopeRadio-KCMI
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: k. c. m. i.
des: Offering the best in Christian Music and teaching, we are Hope Radio - KCMI. We are the only locally owned and operated radio station in Scottsbluff, NE. KCMI has been sharing the hope found in Jesus with the residents in the North Platte River valley since 1981.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
